string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: These tips are scrollable
The tab bar is scrollable
Tap on the number of dice or modifier text to manually set the value
Long tap on the number of dice or modifier arrows to jump it to the next step towards maximum or minimum
Check out the settings for adjusting everything to your liking
The dice buttons can be scrolled through when there are too many dice to fit on one screen
Only 100 dice can be rolled in the shaker at once
Enable dice editing in the settings
When editing is enabled, you can remove dice by long tapping on them and selecting remove die
Simple dice are always named \"d[Roll Max]\"
Custom dice and saved rolls can be named however you like
Named rolls cannot contain the characters \":\" and \";\"
Tap on the grey section of a saved roll to roll it
Saved rolls are still usable even if you remove any, or all, of the dice in the roll
Adding the prefix \"0x\" to a custom die name will display its value in hex
Die values will be displayed in hex, only if all die that are in that roll are also displayed in hex
Long tap on the dice edit button to reset currently created dice
If you want to contribute to the app contact me up at: https://github.com/westonsfiala/CustomDiceRoller
Inspiration for this app came from RPG simple dice. Check out their awesome app!
